text: @BetteMidler Pulling out old routines from the fear mongering playbook...hoards of invading illegals, M13 gangs, terrorizing protesters.  What about the very real conscerns of deaths from coronavirus, escalating national debt, mismanagement of PPP funds for the benefit of tRump donors?
